components.name: Dify Web Application
components.description: The frontend interface for users to interact with the platform, build workflows, and manage models.

components.name: Dify Backend API
components.description: Handles requests from the frontend, processes data, and interacts with the database and external services.

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores user data, model configurations, and workflow states.

components.name: Celery Task Queue
components.description: Manages asynchronous tasks such as model inference and data processing.

components.name: External Model Providers
components.description: Integrates with various LLM providers for model inference and capabilities.

data_flows.description: User requests are sent from the web application to the backend API for processing.
The backend API retrieves and stores data in the database as needed.
The backend API sends tasks to the Celery queue for asynchronous processing.
Tasks are sent to external model providers for inference and data processing.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between user-facing components and backend services.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates user data storage from processing components.
